function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction professionals interacting with COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, vaccination programs, and regular testing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air filtration systems, and remote monitoring tools","People":"Construction professionals, workers, and staff","Owner":"Construction companies, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Multiple rounds of surveys conducted with construction professionals","Impact":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 during survey participation","Mitigation":"Conducting surveys remotely, providing protective equipment, and ensuring proper ventilation in survey locations","Technologies":"Survey platforms, remote conferencing tools, and air quality monitoring systems","People":"Construction professionals participating in the surveys","Owner":"Research organizations, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Global contagion of COVID-19 impacting construction professionals","Impact":"Disruption of construction projects, health risks to professionals, and increased stress levels","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible work arrangements, remote collaboration, and updating health policies","Technologies":"Virtual project management tools, telecommuting platforms, and health monitoring devices","People":"Construction professionals, project teams, and stakeholders","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"}]}
